description:
The maximum supported file size for uploaded music are 8 MB for standard account, 15 MB for premium account and 40 MB for a pro account. Exceeding the given size limit while uploading the audio files will result to an error.


The supported audio is of file format .mp3 and .wav
title: What are the valid file size and format for music files?
description_text: The maximum supported file size for uploaded music are 8 MB for standard account, 15 MB for premium account and 40 MB for a pro account. Exceeding the given size limit while uploading the audio files will result to an error.     The supported audio is of file format .mp3 and .wav

description: You can obviously listen to the music before choosing one among the list of available songs. Just click the play button present on the left-end of each music file listed.
title: Is there any way I can listen to the music before opting it for the video?
description_text: You can obviously listen to the music before choosing one among the list of available songs. Just click the play button present on the left-end of each music file listed.

description: Yes, you can use your own songs. But make sure you use an mp3 or wav file format. To add your own music, hit the button to 'Change Music'. You will be redirected to the audio library where you can see a button to 'Upload'. Click on it, browse the audio from your device and upload it. However, make sure that you have the right to use the music, i.e., the music should either be a licensed copy or a free version.
title: Can I upload my own music to use in my video?
description_text: Yes, you can use your own songs. But make sure you use an mp3 or wav file format. To add your own music, hit the button to 'Change Music'. You will be redirected to the audio library where you can see a button to 'Upload'. Click on it, browse the audio from your device and upload it. However, make sure that you have the right to use the music, i.e., the music should either be a licensed copy or a free version.

description:
Yes, you can easily use multiple music in the same video. All you need to do is add  a group of photos to the first section and then click the button 'Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music. And follow the same sequence thereafter.



PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.
title: Can I use more than one sound track ?
description_text: Yes, you can easily use multiple music in the same video. All you need to do is add  a group of photos to the first section and then click the button 'Add Another Music'. Select a desired audio and add the content to be played under that music. And follow the same sequence thereafter.         PS: If you do not add content (photos/text) to this extra audio, it will not be played in your video.

description: The maximum supported file size for audio is 8 MB for Standard Account, 15 MB for Premium Account and 25 MB for Pro.
title: What is the size limit for uploading audio?
description_text: The maximum supported file size for audio is 8 MB for Standard Account, 15 MB for Premium Account and 25 MB for Pro.

description:
It is very important that you use free and legal music for your video projects. Picovico offers you with a large library of commercially licensed music to make it easy for you to create videos.


In addition, for your ease, there are couple of great sites that provide you with royalty free music for your online videos. Some of the websites providing Royalty Free music downloads are - 

  • Incompetech
  • DanoSongs
  • Moby Gratis
  • Free Soundtrack Music
  • ccMixter
  • Partners in Rhyme
  • PacDV
  • Public Domain 4U
  • Musopen
  • Beatpick
  • YouTube Audio Library
  • Playlists by a YouTube Channel (Audio Library - No Copyright Music)
title: Where can I find royalty free music for my video projects ?
description_text:
It is very important that you use free and legal music for your video projects. Picovico offers you with a large library of commercially licensed music to make it easy for you to create videos. 
   
 
 In addition, for your ease, there are couple of great sites that provide you with royalty free music for your online videos. Some of the websites providing Royalty Free music downloads are -   
 
 
 Incompetech 
 DanoSongs 
 Moby Gratis 
 Free Soundtrack Music 
 ccMixter 
 Partners in Rhyme 
 PacDV 
 Public Domain 4U 
 Musopen 
 Beatpick 
 YouTube Audio Library 
 
Playlists by a YouTube Channel (Audio Library - No Copyright Music)
